Package org.hibernate.search.query.facet

This package contains the classes for the public faceting API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Facet
    A single facet (field value and count).
    FacetingRequest
    Faceting request interface.
    FacetSelection
    Groups a set of Facet to be applied onto a query.
    RangeFacet<T>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FacetSortOrder
    Specifies the order in which the facets are returned.

Package org.hibernate.search.query.facet Description

This package contains the classes for the public faceting API. For a definition of faceting see Faceted Search.
